name: pb-bots
description: Discord multi-bot project built with discord.js and Sequelize

scripts.start: echo "ERROR: Use PM2 to start the bot (npm run deploy or pm2 start ecosystem.config.js)" && exit 1
scripts.dev: echo "ERROR: Use PM2 for development. Do not run nodemon directly." && exit 1
scripts.db:reset: node migration-runner.mjs db:migrate:undo:all && npm run migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.deploy:all: pm2 start ecosystem.sam.config.cjs --env production && pm2 start ecosystem.dean.config.cjs --env production && pm2 start ecosystem.cas.config.cjs --env production && pm2 start ecosystem.jack.config.cjs --env production
scripts.deploy:all:save: pm2 start ecosystem.sam.config.cjs --env production && pm2 start ecosystem.dean.config.cjs --env production && pm2 start ecosystem.cas.config.cjs --env production && pm2 start ecosystem.jack.config.cjs --env production && pm2 save
scripts.stop:all: pm2 stop cas && pm2 stop dean && pm2 stop sam && pm2 stop jack
scripts.restart:all: pm2 restart cas && pm2 restart dean && pm2 restart sam && pm2 restart jack

author: reajamoon@pm.me
